name: Asian Quinoa Salad
description: A quick and easy healthy quinoa salad dressed in sweet and tangy Asian flavors, loaded with tons of veggies!

recipeInstructions.text: To make the vinaigrette, whisk together rice wine vinegar, garlic, sesame oil, sugar, ginger and soy sauce in a small bowl; set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: To make the vinaigrette, whisk together rice wine vinegar, garlic, sesame oil, sugar, ginger and soy sauce in a small bowl; set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, cook quinoa according to package instructions.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium saucepan, cook quinoa according to package instructions.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine quinoa, cabbage, bell pepper, carrots, corn, green onion and avocado. Stir in sesame vinaigrette.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine quinoa, cabbage, bell pepper, carrots, corn, green onion and avocado. Stir in sesame vinaigrette.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, topped with chow mein noodles, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately, topped with chow mein noodles, if desired.

review.reviewBody: This has been one of my favorite recipes for years! I’ve still never made it with the chow mein but it’s still great without! Thanks!

I love this salad. I make it on a regular basis. Even my bf who doesn’t like quinoa is always helping himself when I make it. I add less rice vinegar and more soy sauce and it’s absolutely delicious!!  Thx for the wonderful
Recipe!
